code: export var REQUEST="GET_OTHER_PROFILE_REQUEST";export var SUCCESS="GET_OTHER_PROFILE_SUCCESS";export var FAILURE="GET_OTHER_PROFILE_FAILURE";var getOtherUserProfile=function getOtherUserProfile(url,token){return{types:[REQUEST,SUCCESS,FAILURE],payload:{client:"default",request:{url:url,method:"get",headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}}};};export default{getOtherUserProfile:getOtherUserProfile};
